import { useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGetEmptyLegDetailQuery } from "../../redux/api/emptyLegApi"; import Header from "../Header"; import Footer from "../Footer"; export default function DealsFlightDetail() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { id } = useParams(); const location = useLocation(); const query = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const pax = query.get("pax") || 1; const date = query.get("date"); const time = query.get("time"); // API CALL const { data, error, isLoading } = useGetEmptyLegDetailQuery(id); if (isLoading) return
Loading...
; if (error || !data?.leg) return
Flight details not found
; const leg = data.leg; const flight = leg.flightType; const fromAirport = data.fromAirport; const toAirport = data.toAirport; const handleBookNow = () => { navigate(`/deals-enquiry/${id}?date=${date}&time=${time}&pax=${pax}`); }; return ( <>

Deal Flight Details

{/* -------- LEFT PANEL -------- */}

{flight.name}

  • {date}
  • {time}
  • {pax} Passengers
Speed

{flight.maxSpeed} km/hr

Passengers

{flight.capacity} Person

Travel Time

{Math.floor(leg.travelTime / 60)} hr{" "} {leg.travelTime % 60} min

Luggage

{flight.baggage || "N/A"} kg

Mandatory Guidelines for all travellers

Please arrive 30 minutes before departure. Carry a valid ID. Ensure baggage does not exceed allowed limit.

{/* -------- RIGHT PANEL -------- */}

Ride Route

Route

{/* From → To */}
flight_takeoff
{fromAirport.name} ({fromAirport.iata_code})
flight_land
{toAirport.name} ({toAirport.iata_code})

Distance

location_on
Total Distance: {leg.distance} KM
schedule
Total Time:{" "} {Math.floor(leg.travelTime / 60)} hr {leg.travelTime % 60}{" "} min
{/* PRICE SECTION */}

Deal Price

{leg.exactPrice && (
Original Price
₹ {Number(leg.exactPrice).toLocaleString()}
)}
Offer Price
₹{" "} {Number( leg.offerPrice || leg.exactPrice ).toLocaleString()}
); }
